name: Micro Abyss
description:
Micro Abiss is a roguelike, atmosphere, story tale, and action game. You have to take part in the evolution of species. Bring out a child capable of purifying the Abyss. Upgrade, modify genes. Collect combinations of weapons, skills, genes. Plunge into the atmosphere of the Abyss, learn its secrets, learn all its stories. Take part in dynamic battles, challenge all enemies.

Key features:

  • Emphasis on the visual
  • An atmosphere of adventure and mystery
  • Variability of weapons, improvements, abilities. In the form of genetic engineering
  • Narrative and story

The game is currently at the stage of a playable prototype. You can look at the visual, primary gameplay. Build available for download.

For the further development of the game, your feedback will help me a lot!
